name: CubicRun
description:
This is my first game that i made only by myself.

Controls   A [move left]  , B [move right]

I have also uploaded a better version for Android.

Want more features ? Please leave a comment below with simple features i can add.

Want support me?  Thanks many, many times. (I don't even know how to retrieve the money from itch.io, but i'll be happy).
